name: Battery Status
description: Shows your device battery status in game

enabled.name: Enable Status
enabled.description: Shows the battery status icon/text in game.

displayStatus.name: Display Type
displayStatus.description: Select which type to display the battery status.

checkRate.name: Battery Check Rate
checkRate.description: Set how often (in seconds) to check the battery status.

position.name: Position
position.description: Set the position of the battery status icon/text.

opacity.name: Status Opacity
opacity.description: Set the opacity of the battery status icon/text.

scale.name: Status Scale
scale.description: Set the scale of the battery status icon/text.

lowThreshold.name: Low Battery Threshold
lowThreshold.description: Set the battery percentage threshold for low battery status.

mediumThreshold.name: Medium Battery Threshold
mediumThreshold.description: Set the battery percentage threshold for medium battery status.

highThreshold.name: High Battery Threshold
highThreshold.description: Set the battery percentage threshold for high battery status.
